lifeEventForm.title: Benefit finder: death of a loved one
lifeEventForm.summary: We are sorry for your loss. This tool helps you find federal benefits during this difficult time. Answer a few questions to get a list of your potential survivor benefits.

lifeEvent.title: Benefit finder: retirement
lifeEvent.body: Find retirement benefits for help with expenses, health care, and more.
lifeEvent.cta: Find retirement benefits for help with expenses, health care, and more.

lifeEvent.title: Benefit finder: disability

lifeEvent.cta: Find disability benefits to help with bills, education, jobs, and more.

benefit.title: COVID-19 funeral assistance
benefit.summary: Financial assistance for burial and funeral costs for someone who died of COVID-19. To be eligible, you were not reimbursed for funeral or burial expenses by any organization or agency.
